item.description:
The Lobster Boat has been serving affordable family meals to locals and visitors for over 30 years. They serve the fresh local seafood their own Fish Market located on the premises.

A unique casual waterfront seafood experience allows you to enjoy our Cape Cod style outdoor waterfront dining pier or in a protected enclosed dining room, both situated on scenic Parkers River overlooking the Marina.

Featuring specials and offering cocktails, wine and delicious refreshing frozen drinks from their boat bar. The menu includes favorites like homemade onion rings, Lobster Boat Combo, 3 lb. Lobster and Cape Cod Platter.

The restaurant offers a variety of seafood as well as other dinner choices. Known for offering Twin Lobsters which are culls (one claw each) for a reasonable price (between $20-$23).

A Great place to kick of the end of summer and to celebrate Doreen's Birthday!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my pink hat!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group
